item.title: Simple Cicd Setup
item.description: Almost every software developer has built some kind of side project, which is great. But there are so many projects that never leave local and are only visible through a GitHub repository. Because of this, here is my simple ci-cd setup, which makes deploying applications easy. The goal of the setup is not high availability, or to handle much load, but it should be a starting point for any small application.
